name: VOIP
description:
Made for Blossom Jam 2021

VOIP is a very short platformer where you can shoot bullets that turn into a platform upon hitting surfaces. The platforms you create slowly descend so you have to hurry up and get through the obstacles!

Use arrow keys to move, press space to spawn a platform

Music: Super Mario Galaxy - Freezeflame Galaxy

Thanks to Kağan Morkoç for helping out with the level design.
